text:
Two fixes:

The actual calling of the function "validate_redirect_uri()" did not include a "request" argument as specified in the request validator documentation.  This has been fixed.

The actual calling of the function "validate_response_type()" did not include a "client" argument as specified in the request validator documentation.  This has been fixed.
title: Additional validator inconsistency fixes
